Key Arguments: The legislation is viewed as censorship similar to that of the Chinese Communist Party.
The government and fact-checkers are accused of spreading misinformation.
Mainstream media is perceived as spreading misinformation without allowing audience response.
The bill is seen as an attempt by the government to suppress the truth.
Free speech is emphasized as a fundamental right in a democracy.
Notable Quotes: It is censorship akin to the CCP.
Free speech is a right in a democracy.
The govt is happy for main stream media to broadcast or should I say try to brainwash their audience with misinformation but not for the audience to respond.
